name: The Withering (itch)
description:
The Withering has decayed the land, in response the magic of a cleansing light has summoned you. 

This is my first game as part of the Ultimate Game Jam, a bracket style elimination game jam for YouTubers. 

The theme of the jam was "decay" and I did my best to make a fun/unique game mechanic that fit with that theme. 

How to play is in the game. 

Enjoy!
